name: A.W.E | Advanced Warfare Expedition
description:
AWE is a space combat simulator, without the drag.

Experience the Advanced Warfare Expedition in the Altus F.2 Strike Fighter- use different loadouts to tackle various missions set in a conflict within deep space.

This is the first proper demo release; AWE is still very much a WIP, with missing voice lines and many objects missing textures- there's still so much more I want to add and improve! 

There were quite a lot of major system changes implemented shortly before release, and I didn't have time when releasing this to test every bit of the game outside of the editor.

Known issues for v0.25b:

  • The searchlight has far less range than it should, and doesn't look great visually.
  • Course 3 with smooth shading in build is very difficult to navigate, turns are hard to see coming.
  • Discord rich presence says that you've been playing the game for several hours.
  • Time control inputs are often buggy
